com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.qna

Class QNASavedProgressHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.qna.QNASavedProgressHelper

  • public class QNASavedProgressHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    QNASavedProgressHelper is hereby defined here as the saved state of the quiz. The saved QNA progress is stored internally onPause(), in case the user exits the quiz without finishing it.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yvgenij Sharovskij

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor to instantiate SharedPreferences to the default SharedPreferences.

    • Method Detail

      • setContinueFromSavedProgress

        public void setContinueFromSavedProgress(int progress)
        Sets the saved state in case the user is continuing from a previously saved quiz session.
        Parameters:
        progress - 1, if continuing from a previously saved state

      • getContinueFromSavedProgress

        public int getContinueFromSavedProgress()
        Gets the saved state to check if the user is continuing from a previously saved quiz session.
        Returns:
        1, if continuing from a previously saved state

      • setSavedProgress

        public void setSavedProgress(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> questionList,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedAnswerList,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> correctAnswerList)
        Saves the QNA progress when the user interrupts the quiz before it's complete. In order to have multiple saves of the same progress on multiple quiz tries, existing progress is added upon the current quiz progress.
        Note: utilizes a LinkedHashSet which is defined as a hash table and linked list implementation of the Set interface used to remember the order in which the elements were inserted into the set, and return its elements in that order.
        Note that the insertion order is not affected if an element is re-inserted into the set.
        Parameters:
        questionList - question list
        selectedAnswerList - selected answer list
        correctAnswerList - correct answer list

      • getPrependedList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPrependedList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input,
                                                              int prepend,
                                                              int size)
        Returns the input list with a prepend for each list element up to the selected size. Used to sort the list, which is randomized onCreate.
        Parameters:
        input - the input list
        prepend - the prepend
        size - the list size()
        Returns:
        ArrayList: the input list with a prepend for each list element up to the selected size

      • removeQNASavedProgress

        public void removeQNASavedProgress()
        Removes the saved QNA progress from the SharedPreferences.
        Note: commit() makes the commit immediately, whereas apply() handles it in the background.
